			2704 = { state_scope = { change_region_name = "§bJanMayen,§!" } }
			2704 = { secede_province = QQQ }
		}
		random_country = {
			limit = {
				tag = JAN
				government = constitutional_empire
				has_country_flag = slot_2_countries_list_loc
			}
			2704 = { secede_province = THIS }
			2704 = { state_scope = { change_region_name = "§bJanMayen,§!" } }
			2704 = { secede_province = QQQ }
		}
    }
}
